plot: Spoiled TV Host Mikey Valentine is ending his six year long at number one. Time for the show to be laid to rest and time for Mikey to find another job. Move over Nicole and Paris, Mikey is out to become the ultimate bar staff!
plot_en: Spoiled TV Host Mikey Valentine is ending his six year long at number one. Time for the show to be laid to rest and time for Mikey to find another job. Move over Nicole and Paris, Mikey is out to become the ultimate bar staff!
plot_es: Spoiled TV Host Mikey Valentine is ending his six year long at number one. Time for the show to be laid to rest and time for Mikey to find another job. Move over Nicole and Paris, Mikey is out to become the ultimate bar staff!
title: Spoiled for Hire
